snippet: Two Texas high school football players said that a coach whom they did not identify had told them to strike the referee Robert Watts during a game because of missed calls that had hurt the team.
abstract: Michael Moreno and Victor Rojas, football players at Jay High School in San Antonio who deliberately struck referee Robert Watts at game, claim they were told to do so by coach in retaliation for missed calls.
lead_paragraph: Two Texas high school football players said that a coach whom they did not identify had told them to strike the referee Robert Watts during a game because of missed calls that had hurt the team.

headline.print_headline: Players Say They Were Told to Retaliate
headline.main: Players Say They Were Told to Retaliate
